name: PWDO-Runman
body:
### Welcome
Here you will find much of the materials for the FFC Game Dev Workshop.

### Reminder
The game needs to run on an http server for it to run without loading problems.

### Asset sources
http://opengameart.org/content/several-scrolling-backgrounds-and-layerable-runners

http://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=8986.0

http://www.wayofthepixel.net/index.php?topic=1082.0;nowap
tagline: Sample game for FFC Game Dev Workshop
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
